content:
Yes—let’s quickly verify your GPU and hardware information to make sure we understand exactly what's going on.

Please run the following commands, and paste the results here:

```bash
lspci | grep -i --color 'vga\|3d\|2d'
uname -a
cat /etc/os-release
```

This will tell us:

- **GPU Model** (to confirm NVIDIA GPU model or detect if AMD/Intel graphics are present)
- **Kernel and OS Version** (to ensure compatibility with drivers)

This info will help quickly pinpoint the exact issue and confirm the correct driver and CUDA setup.
